data.message: Lol look at all these white trash people commenting. Go live in Iraq or something because we don't want you here. The majority has spoken.

replies.message: The majority spoke in California and the Supreme Court overturned their decision.

I don't recall CA ever voting to legalize same sex marriage before they voted to make it illegal.  Doesn't make sense.
